users.description: Never tell me the odds !

tweets.text: @GroundwaterMike How did you get this? When I wanted to risk assess these I was told we didn't have records!?!?

@GroundwaterMike Back in the day the @EnvAgency & its predecessors did lots of research on landfill risk. To line, or attenuated? Cover & gas generation? Monitoring & modelling.  We shouldn't reinvent the wheel, but we do need to consider hazards & risks with modern science.

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

tweets.text: @DoddyDodds @EnvAgency Sounds like @EnvAgency Chief Exec is setting the strategy as he sees it, but isn‚Äôt capturing their tactics on how to deliver in practice‚òπÔ∏è
@GroundwaterMike @EnvAgency The issue isn't regulation. It is the regulatory strategy, the regulations, skills & resources of the regulator. The regulated accept #GoodRegulation!

tweets.text:
#MytholmroydFAS - We're reinforcing the river bank  between White Houses & Hawksclough to provide extra protection against scour in high river flows.

To do this safely we need to close one lane on Burnley Road during working hours next week. 
#flooding 

https://t.co/HgdBp7TncO https://t.co/zPCza70bYH

We have issued some #flood alerts and warnings as river levels rise because of persistent rain and snow melt. Keep up to date with the latest warnings here: https://t.co/OVBXgMyngb 
#Floodaware https://t.co/fj1CMUnTpU

Homes and businesses have a duty of care to ensure that waste is disposed of safely and responsibly.

Help us deter waste criminals and reduce illegal fly-tipping by ensuring your waste carrier is registered. 

check our public register online or call 03708 506 506.

#Wastecrime https://t.co/Joog70EeOm

There is a lot of water in the drains, watercourses and lagoons at the moment, but Hull City Council and our @LivingWithH2O partners @EnvAgencyYNE @YorkshireWater and @ERfloodrisk are aware and are working together around the clock to try and keep the water where it belongs! https://t.co/KjDZq6iQlY
@cathseal1 @EnvAgencyYNE @DefraGovUK @Tallulahswine Good luck with the new job, Cath. Where are you off to?
@cathseal1 @EnvAgencyYNE @DefraGovUK @Tallulahswine Aw, sorry I couldn't join! Definitely jealous of the espresso martinis too. Once again, good luck with the new job & don't be a stranger!

tweets.text: @guyshrubsole @RachSalv @GeorgeMonbiot @EnvAgency There‚Äôs a view that it‚Äôs just ‚Äòrubbish‚Äô - unsightly but not too harmful. Our work shows even old newspapers and fabric have soaked up pollutants

@guyshrubsole @GeorgeMonbiot @DrKateSpencer @EnvAgency I'm hearing this a lot. There are a number of sites that look as though they should be part 2A (and so EA responsibility) but they haven't been designated for one reason or another...

@RachSalv @GeorgeMonbiot I've been to some of the leaking coastal landfills with @DrKateSpencer that she's been investigating. This one at Tilbury continues to leach out old rubbish, inc old car batteries. But no-one is taking responsibility for it - not the local council, nor the @EnvAgency. https://t.co/yWOXa7xpJS

We've partnered with @EnvAgency, @hantsconnect and @NaturalEngland to explore options for a sustainable future for the coast between Hurst Spit and Lymington. 

Help us out and let us know your thoughts at https://t.co/OA0ebR4EGc https://t.co/qF0TquFSUn

Flood water is dangerous. Don't put yourself or others at risk.

#northyorkshire https://t.co/JFPLxwjJwK
